description.value:
Special: Accurate, Concussive (0), Overcharge

Note: Sonic Weapon, uses a backpack ammo supply included in weapon weight. When used on Overcharge Setting, everyone within 10m including character make +10 Toughness Test or suffer 1 Fatigue per DoF. Devices that block loud noises or sonic attacks give +10 to test.
